message: Let's be fair, Bob. I know this deal benefits us both.
Come on Alice, I know you want to get this over with. This is a reasonable offer considering the inflation.
Don't be greedy, Bob. This is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm still here. Inflation is on my side.
This is ridiculous, Bob. Let's just split it evenly and be done with it.
I'm not backing down. You're losing value every round, I'm not.
